Uses of Class
pitt.search.semanticvectors.VectorStoreRAM

  • Packages that use VectorStoreRAM 
    Package Description
    pitt.search.semanticvectors
    Semantic Vector indexes, created by applying a Random Projection algorithm to term-document matrices created using Apache Lucene.
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.orthography
    Package for orthographic representation, i.e., making vectors based on the characters that occur in a string.

    • Uses of VectorStoreRAM in pitt.search.semanticvectors

      Methods in pitt.search.semanticvectors that return VectorStoreRAM 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static VectorStoreRAM VectorStoreRAM.readFromFile(FlagConfig flagConfig, String vectorFile)
      Returns a new vector store, initialized from disk with the given vectorFile.

    • Uses of VectorStoreRAM in pitt.search.semanticvectors.orthography

      Methods in pitt.search.semanticvectors.orthography that return VectorStoreRAM 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VectorStoreRAM NumberRepresentation.getNumberVectors(int iStart, int iEnd)
      Gets a sequence of number vectors, the first and last of which are the demarcator vectors, and the intervening members being evenly linearly distributed between these.
